radiographic_examinations.findings: Multilobulated mass isodense to hyperdense measuring 8 cm by 7.5 cm by 6.5 cm in the urinary bladder, diffuse fat stranding in perivesical and left periurethral regions, bilateral intrarenal calculi and cysts.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Ultrasonography of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Bilateral renal cysts and bilateral nonobstructing nephrolithiasis.

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Irregular thickening of the bladder wall observed with an irregular, multiloculated gas collection, 2.5 cm by 3.5 cm, in the suprapubic region.

radiographic_examinations.findings: No evidence of recurrent or metastatic cancer.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: PSA level has remained below 0.1 ng per milliliter.
